import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { teacher } from '../_models/entityModels'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reg-teacher', templateUrl: './reg-teacher.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reg-teacher.component.css'] }) export class RegTeacherComponent implements OnInit { baseurl = "https://localhost:7217/api/" teacher : teacher | any ={}; constructor(private http: HttpClient){}; ngOnInit(): void { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } register(){ console.log(this.teacher); // this.http.post(this.baseurl + "teacher/register/" , this.teacher).subscribe({}) } }
